name: Real-time Card Request Status Updates via Chatbot
description: This automation pattern retrieves real-time status updates from a card management system using its APIs and provides the updates to customers through a chatbot interface.
input_requirements: API access to card management system

banned_tools: Avoid using tools that do not comply with financial data handling regulations

llm_recommended_approach: Use OAuth to authenticate and securely connect to the card management system's API. Leverage cloud functions to handle real-time data retrieval and push updates to a chatbot platform like Dialogflow. Ensure real-time communication by efficiently handling API responses and user queries.
